description:
A comfortable three bedroom apartment in the heart of Bedford-Stuyvesant. Great neighborhood, 30 minutes from Manhattan. A quiet place to stay when you are in the city that never sleeps.

Private and comfortable

Washer/dryer, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, private balcony

I am very active with my guests. I work right downstairs from the apartment so I am always available and willing to go above and beyond for my guests.

It is an up-incoming neighborhood with great people and sights to see.

Their are both buses and trains within walking distance of the property.

One of the coziest and guest friendly places to stay in Brooklyn.
name: 3 bedroom Cozy!
